Package io.github.jgame.sprite

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jgame.sprite.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BulletSprite, Enemy, MaskedSprite, PlatformerPlayer, ProgressBar, Projectile, ShapeSprite, TextSprite
    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Sprites! Support for translating, collision detection, rotating, scaling, and reflection!

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Vector2 absPos
      The absolute position to blit this image to.
      boolean active
      active determines whether this sprite is acting as a button (ButtonManager.update() would call this sprite's updateHover(boolean, Vector2) and onClick(Vector2)
      private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage defaultImage
      The placeholder image to use in case the image passed to the constructor is null.
      boolean flipHorizontal
      Horizontal mirroring/reflection
      boolean flipVertical
      Vertical mirroring/reflection
      (package private) java.util.LinkedList<Group> groups
      A list of groups this sprite is in.
      (package private) java.awt.image.BufferedImage image
      The sprite's image.
      private java.util.logging.Logger logger
      Logger object used for logging.
      Vector2 pos
      The position of the sprite.
      (package private) java.awt.Rectangle rect
      The rectangle used for collision detection by the sprite.
      double rot
      The rotation of the sprite.
      (package private) Vector2 size
      The dimensions of the image.
      Vector2 vel
      The velocity of the sprite.
      boolean visible
      Determines if ButtonManager.blit(Graphics2D g2d) also draws this sprite.
      (package private) double[] zoom

    • Field Detail

      • defaultImage

        private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage defaultImage
        The placeholder image to use in case the image passed to the constructor is null.

      • visible

        public boolean visible
        Determines if ButtonManager.blit(Graphics2D g2d) also draws this sprite. See ButtonManager

      • active

        public boolean active
        active determines whether this sprite is acting as a button (ButtonManager.update() would call this sprite's updateHover(boolean, Vector2) and onClick(Vector2)

      • flipVertical

        public boolean flipVertical
        Vertical mirroring/reflection

      • flipHorizontal

        public boolean flipHorizontal
        Horizontal mirroring/reflection

      • pos

        public Vector2 pos
        The position of the sprite.

      • vel

        public Vector2 vel
        The velocity of the sprite.

      • rot

        public double rot
        The rotation of the sprite.

      • rect

        java.awt.Rectangle rect
        The rectangle used for collision detection by the sprite.

      • absPos

        protected Vector2 absPos
        The absolute position to blit this image to. (the topleft of the image.)

      • image

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage image
        The sprite's image.

      • logger

        private java.util.logging.Logger logger
        Logger object used for logging.

      • groups

        java.util.LinkedList<Group> groups
        A list of groups this sprite is in.

      • zoom

        double[] zoom

      • size

        Vector2 size
        The dimensions of the image.

        Create a new sprite!

    • Method Detail

      • updateRect

        public void updateRect()
        Update absPos and rect according to pos and size.

      • blit

        public void blit​(java.awt.Graphics2D screen)
        Blit routine. Override this. Blank by default.
        Parameters:
        screen - Screen to blit to.

      • updateImage

        public void updateImage​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
        Update the current image.
        Parameters:
        img - New image

      • blitTo

        public void blitTo​(java.awt.Graphics2D screen)
        Blit the sprite to the screen at the correct position. Apply appropriate AffineTransformations defined by rot, zoom, etc.
        Parameters:
        screen - Screen to blit to.

      • updateHover

        public void updateHover​(boolean isHovering,
                        Vector2 mousePos)
        Update the image of the sprite according to the mouse's state over the sprite. See ButtonManager
        Parameters:
        isHovering - true if mouse is hovering over the sprite
        mousePos - The position of the mouse

      • onClick

        public void onClick​(Vector2 mousePos)
        What to do when the sprite is clicked. See ButtonManager
        Parameters:
        mousePos - Where the mouse is.

      • zoomTo

        public void zoomTo​(double[] z)
        Scale the image to specific dimensions.
        Parameters:
        z - Dimensions.

      • blitRect

        public void blitRect​(java.awt.Graphics2D screen)
        Draw the hitbox of the sprite to the screen to visualize collisions.
        Parameters:
        screen - Screen to blit to.

      • collidesWith

        public java.util.LinkedList<Sprite> collidesWith​(Group sprites)
        Check if this sprite collides with any sprite in the group.
        Parameters:
        sprites - Group to check
        Returns:
        List of sprites we are touching.

      • update

        public void update()
        Logic update. Override this.

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Remove this sprite from all groups it's in, effectively removing any reference to it.
